BackstoryDef.title: powerhouse
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]’s fate was sealed before [PAWN_pronoun] was even born: to become a guardian. To serve, honour, live and die for [PAWN_possessive] master. The masters that guardians serve are usually of physically weak but mentally superb races, such as genies or seren. As such, [PAWN_nameDef] was specifically bred to have enough strength for two.

BackstoryDef.title: prospective guardian
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: As a baby of royal blood is born, so is an assemblage of prospective guardians. These newborn powerhouses are bred to possess the crème-de-la-crème of minotaur genetics — ensuring that their bodies are fit, literally, for a king. \n\nOf all of the calves bred for this purpose, only the strongest can become a guardian, becoming bound to their royal master for life. [PAWN_nameDef] was such a calf.

BackstoryDef.title: rejected guardian
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was reared to become a guardian of a rather troublesome young aristocrat. Upon meeting [PAWN_possessive] master for the first time, [PAWN_pronoun] was scorned and rejected, with [PAWN_possessive] master in disbelief that such an abhorrent creature could exist outside of fairy-tales. [PAWN_nameDef] never recovered from such rejection.

BackstoryDef.title: friendly guardian
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born to protect a young monarch, yet their relationship was more akin to siblinghood than anything else. As the two of them aged, learnt, and played together, their bond became totally unbreakable.\n\nSince most of [PAWN_possessive] time was spent playfighting with [PAWN_possessive] young master, [PAWN_nameDef] rarely had much time to practise [PAWN_possessive] domestic skills.

BackstoryDef.title: lab-grown guardian
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was biologically engineered to be the perfect guardian to [PAWN_possessive] master. Grown within the clutches of a cold, glass vat, [PAWN_nameDef] was then raised to solely follow three principles. To fight, to serve, and to obey.

BackstoryDef.title: brave guardian
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a guardian to a very important figure in society. Though the relationship was initially rocky, the two gained an unbreakable, unconditional bond capable of weathering even the fiercest of storms. [PAWN_nameDef] was never afraid to look death in the eye for [PAWN_possessive] master.

BackstoryDef.title: stoic guardian
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a disciplined and stoic guardian to [PAWN_possessive] master, uttering not even the smallest of sounds unless it was by their request. Though [PAWN_possessive] spoke very little, [PAWN_possessive] was capable of penning the most saccharine and passionate poetry known to man. Well, that is, if man was ever able to see it.

BackstoryDef.title: compassionate guardian
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a loving and compassionate guardian to [PAWN_possessive] master, readily repurposing [PAWN_possessive] body as a comforting pillow to them when times were tough.

BackstoryDef.title: pining guardian
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]’s unrequited feelings of love for [PAWN_possessive] master forever brought [PAWN_objective] shame and anguish. Watching them fall in love with potential suitors over and over again only worsened the wound that [PAWN_nameDef] had to hide.

BackstoryDef.title: clumsy guardian
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Out of all of the guardians out there, [PAWN_nameDef] is certainly one of them. Though [PAWN_pronoun] really, really tries [PAWN_possessive] best, nothing can ever seem to go right for [PAWN_objective].

BackstoryDef.title: guardian
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was assigned to protect a member of the royal family, vowing to fight to the death to ensure [PAWN_possessive] master’s safety.

BackstoryDef.title: elegant guardian
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] served [PAWN_possessive] master diligently. Whether it was slaying a foe on the battlefield or pouring the finest cup of tea on this side of the rim, [PAWN_nameDef] executed [PAWN_possessive] duties with finesse and class.

BackstoryDef.title: illicit guardian
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] developed illicit relations with [PAWN_possessive] master, an act only punishable by death. The two carefully strategized the location and time of their meetings in order to evade the public eye, until eventually, the two saw it best to end their relationship for their own safety.\n\n [PAWN_nameDef] continued to guard [PAWN_possessive] master with a broken heart and a tear in [PAWN_possessive] eye.

BackstoryDef.title: tender guardian
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] not only cared for [PAWN_possessive] master, but cared for each and every one of the darling animals residing in the royal stables.

BackstoryDef.title: show calf
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was the perfect show calf. Many show calves resented their human owners, but [PAWN_nameDef] somewhat enjoyed all of the attention.

BackstoryDef.title: runaway
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was taken from [PAWN_possessive] family at birth. A standard procedure on a minotaur farm. These farms were typically established by humans, who would slaughter minotaurs for their desirable and large amounts of meat.\n\n[PAWN_nameDef] didn’t take too kindly to the thought of being someone’s supper, and escaped captivity in the dead of night.

BackstoryDef.title: isolated
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] lived most of [PAWN_possessive] childhood nestled in the bosom of a mountainous tundra. [PAWN_possessive] village was quaint and full of life, but violently anti-human. \n\n[PAWN_nameDef]’s father warned [PAWN_objective] to check under [PAWN_possessive] bed every night for humans — a habit that has rendered [PAWN_nameDef] skeptical of such horrifying creatures, even today.

BackstoryDef.title: maze dweller
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised in a vast labyrinth, destined to guard the treasures that lay within its depths. But those shining, unknown treasures were just too tempting for [PAWN_nameDef]’s parents, who ultimately ventured into the golden vault and never returned.

BackstoryDef.title: wild beast
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was found and reared by a tribe like a wild animal.

BackstoryDef.title: roamer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] lived like a wild animal and roamed the lands on all-fours in search of food and shelter.

BackstoryDef.title: city dweller
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised in a diverse society of xenos. Unlike many members of [PAWN_possessive] race, [PAWN_nameDef] was always happy to play and interact with humans as equals.

BackstoryDef.title: veal
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Veal — the meat of young minotaur calves — was widely coveted on [PAWN_nameDef]’s home planet for its unique flavour. [PAWN_nameDef] was specifically bred to be large, fatty and eventually served up on a human’s dinner plate. But a cult of minotaur supremacists raided the operation, freeing [PAWN_nameDef] and releasing her into the wild.

BackstoryDef.title: human fighter
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] participated in the timeless minotaur tradition of 'humanfighting'. Plucky humans would stride into the ring bearing a red cloth, only to soon cower beneath it in an attempt to hide themselves from [PAWN_nameDef]’s frightful horns.\n\n The climax of the performance was called the ‘estocada’, in which [PAWN_nameDef] would pierce the heart or spine of the human with an elegant steel blade. All of this bloodshed didn’t trouble [PAWN_nameDef]. No, [PAWN_pronoun] lived for it.

BackstoryDef.title: logger
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] felled trees for a living. [PAWN_pronoun] sawed trunks with [PAWN_possessive] horns and exported the spoils to nearby human settlements.

BackstoryDef.title: cut of meat
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was sold to an intergalactic butcher for [PAWN_possessive] delectable meat. Upon entering the butcher's trade ship, [PAWN_nameDef] broke free from [PAWN_possessive] shackles and made mincemeat of each and every one of the crew, leaving not one survivor to tell the tale, but [PAWN_objective].

BackstoryDef.title: xenohustler
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] made a living working in a ‘xenobrothel’. The backbone of the business was, unsurprisingly, human tourists, who would slobber at the chance to experience lovin’ with the rim's rarest xenos.\n\nIt wasn’t unusual for [PAWN_nameDef]’s clients to require medical attention after their tumble under the sheets.

BackstoryDef.title: treasurekeeper
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] guarded a mystifying labyrinth from those attempting to plunder the treasures inside.

BackstoryDef.title: feral
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] returned to the wild like a feral beast. Those who came toe-to-hoof with [PAWN_objective] might have preferred a swift end, but [PAWN_nameDef] made every one of [PAWN_possessive] kills last.

BackstoryDef.title: hothead
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: No matter what job [PAWN_nameDef] picked up, no matter what friendships [PAWN_pronoun] made, [PAWN_pronoun] could always be sure that [PAWN_possessive] explosive temper would be the end of it.

BackstoryDef.title: alpha
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was the leader of a tyrannical minotaur cult. [PAWN_pronoun] believed in dehorning [PAWN_possessive] followers to establish [PAWN_objective]self as the uncontested alpha.

BackstoryDef.title: minotaur cultist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a follower of an underground minotaur cult. Every member of the cult was branded with a hot iron to prove their devotion, and it was [PAWN_nameDef]’s hand that did it. [PAWN_pronoun] began to lose [PAWN_possessive] sense of both pain and empathy over time.

BackstoryDef.title: akabeko
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a healer in [PAWN_possessive] village’s temple. Other minotaurs said that [PAWN_nameDef]’s mere presence was enough to ward off diseases.

BackstoryDef.title: human rancher
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Turning the rhetoric on its head, [PAWN_nameDef] was a minotaur who worked on a human farm; breeding, feeding and slaughtering the little creatures for their meat. Though human meat wasn’t for everyone, [PAWN_nameDef] had never tasted something so delicious and tender.
